name: 3D Polyhedral Minesweeper
description:
Minesweeper but on 3D uniform polyhedra!

Have you ever wanted to play Minesweeper in 3D? No? I did.

Includes 14 different solids to play Minesweeper on, each solid's faces are subdivided to reach a reasonable amount of tiles. All typical minesweeper rules apply.

Use WASD to rotate the object, and H to disable highlight.

This is the first game I've ever uploaded. If you have any bug reports, suggestions or want to contact for any other reason, send me an email at: daanniiionline @ gmail.com don't be afraid to say hi!
